history.content:
Make sure the ACM library recognizes you are on a UC Berkeley IP - it should say "UC Berkeley" at the top of the page. If not, maybe try clearing your cache and reloading the page, or opening the page in an incognito window. The PDF link next to "Full Text" should be clickable at this point.

I just connected to the VPN and tried and it worked for me.

I am trying to download papers from https://dl.acm.org for some research I am doing. Does anyone know how to access them for free? I figure the school is already paying for access. I am using the school's VPN and I am not sure how to download the PDFs w/o paying...
history.subject: how to access acm digital library papers
